author: Baha'u'llah
source_text:
(٢٧) ﴿ يَا ابْنَ الإِنْسانِ ﴾
لَا تَنَفَّسْ بِخَطَأِ أَحَدٍ مَا دُمْتَ خاطِئًا، وَإِنْ تَفْعَلْ بِغَيْرِ ذَلِكَ مَلْعُونٌ أَنْتَ، وَأَنَا شاهِدٌ بِذَلِكَ.
translation:
(27) O SON OF MAN!
Breathe not the sins of others so long as thou art thyself a sinner. Shouldst thou transgress this command, accursed wouldst thou be, and to this I bear witness.
